title: Weekly Threat Intelligence Briefing
description: A threat intelligence analyst must prepare the weekly threat briefing for the CISO and security leadership.

tasks.description: Review all major threat intelligence reports, security news, and new CVEs from the past week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst synthesizes a large amount of information into key themes.

tasks.description: Identify the threats and vulnerabilities that are most relevant to the organization.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly filters the information down to what is most important for their specific company.

tasks.description: Create a concise presentation summarizing the key threats, their potential impact, and recommended actions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a clear, actionable briefing for leadership.
